channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In 2026, AI will move from hype to pragmatism
item.description: In 2026, here's what you can expect from the AI industry: new architectures, smaller models, world models, reliable agents, physical AI, and products ...

item.title: Even as global crop prices fall, India’s Arya.ag is attracting investors — and staying profitable
item.description: Arya.ag, an Indian agritech company offering storage facilities near farms and offering lending services to hundreds of thousands of farmers, has draw...

item.title: What Is the ‘Super Flu’ That Is Spreading in Europe and the United States?
item.description: The “super flu” behind outbreaks in the US and UK is a new variant of influenza A H3N2, subclade K. Existing vaccines appear to be insufficiently effe...

item.title: You Can Track Plenty of Fitness Stats With Just Your Phone—No Wearables Required
item.description: You can log your steps, track your sleep, and measure your progress toward your goals using your phone alone.

item.title: Nvidia’s AI empire: A look at its top startup investments
item.description: Over the last two years, Nvidia has used its ballooning fortunes to invest in over 100 AI startups. Here are the giant semiconductor's largest investm...

item.title: Pebble reboots its thinnest smartwatch with the Pebble Round 2
item.description: Pebble launches a $199 smartwatch with rounded screen that can last up to 2 weeks on one charge.

item.title: The 16 top logistics, manufacturing, materials startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the logistics, manufacturing, and materials Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them ...

item.title: How Protesters Became Content for the Cops
item.description: The tactics behind protest policing are changing—from one of cooperation to intentional antagonism for political marketing purposes.

item.title: 20% Off Brooks Promo Code & Deals for January 2026
item.description: Enjoy 20% off your first order with a Brooks coupon code, plus top discounts and deals on our favorite Brooks running shoes.

item.title: Clicks debuts its own take on the BlackBerry smartphone, plus a $79 snap-on mobile keyboard
item.description: The company behind the add-on mobile keyboards with physical buttons is now doing its own phone.
